official_title: A bill to amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to eliminate, subsequent to the death of an individual named  as having an insurable interest, the annuity reduction made in order to provide a survivor annuity for such individual.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service with amendment, H. Rept. 94-253) Provides that an annuity of a Federal employee which is reduced, as provided by law to provide a survivor annuity, shall, effective the first day of the month following the death of the individual with an insurable interest, be recomputed and paid as if the annuity had not been so reduced.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to eliminate, subsequent to the death of an individual named  as having an insurable interest, the annuity reduction made in order to provide a survivor annuity for such individual.
